Law of Unpredictability: In this universe, every action and decision would be completely random and unpredictable, making it impossible to plan or control anything.
Law of Chaos: This universe would follow the laws of chaos, where order would constantly shift and change, causing chaos and confusion at every turn.

Law of Gravity: In this universe, gravity would be the only force at work, and everything would be attracted to each other, creating a world where objects and people would constantly be pulled towards each other.
Law of Reality: This universe would follow the laws of reality, where everything would be based on logic and reason, and nothing would be possible without a clear explanation.
Law of Survival: In this universe, only the strongest and most adaptable would survive, and the weak and vulnerable would be eliminated, creating a harsh and unforgiving world.
